00030 #include "RegularStimulusZeroNetCharge.hpp"
00031 #include <cmath>
00032 
00033 RegularStimulusZeroNetCharge::RegularStimulusZeroNetCharge(double magnitudeOfStimulus, double duration, double period, double startTime, double stopTime)
00034     : RegularStimulus(magnitudeOfStimulus, duration, period, startTime,stopTime)
00035 {
00036 
00037 }
00038 
00039 double RegularStimulusZeroNetCharge::GetStimulus(double time)
00040 {
00041     /*
00042      * This covers a borderline case where start time is larger than period
00043      * and period divides start time, e.g. start_time=2 period=1.
00044      *
00045      * fmod() will return -0 in this case and will therefore switch the stimulus on.
00046      */
00047     if (time < mStartTime)
00048     {
00049         return 0.0;
00050     }
00051 
00052     double beatTime = fmod(time-mStartTime,mPeriod);
00053 
00054     if (beatTime >=0 && beatTime <= mDuration/2 && time <= mStopTime)
00055     {
00056         return mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00057     }
00058     else if (beatTime >=0 && beatTime > mDuration/2 && beatTime <= mDuration && time <= mStopTime)
00059     {
00060         return -mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00061     }
00062     else
00063     {
00064         return 0.0;
00065     }
00066 }
00067 
00068 // Serialization for Boost >= 1.36
00069 #include "SerializationExportWrapperForCpp.hpp"
00070 CHASTE_CLASS_EXPORT(RegularStimulusZeroNetCharge)
